item.description:
Join me to hear photographer Scott Indermaur talk about his current installation "This I believe: Revealed" at the Newport Art Museum!

Love the NPR's "This I believe"? Like portrait photography and a good story? Here's your chance to check out the local RI connection!

Exhibit opens March 31st - May 20th

Reception March 30th - 5-7pm

Artists Talk - Thursday, April 12th - 6-7pm

In an upcoming exhibition at the Newport Art Museum, photographer Scott Indermaur brings together concepts of identity, a higher existence and inner truth in his striking photographic portraits of people whose essays have been featured on Rhode Island Public Radio (RI’s NPR) series, “This I Believe – Rhode Island.” Based on a collaboration with RI’s NPR, the exhibition “THIS I BELIEVE REVEALED: Scott Indermaur” opens on March 31 and runs through May 20, 2012 in the Museum’s Wright Gallery.

For more info on Scott's "Revealed" project - click on the side navigation to find out more: http://www.revealedproject.com/2012/02/16/newport-art-museum-exhibit-033012-to-052012/

The Newport Art Museum hosts a reception for its spring exhibitions on Friday, March 30, 2012, 5 – 7 pm. The reception is free for Museum members. A $10 donation is suggested for non-members. Indermaur will talk about his work on Newport Gallery Night, Thursday, April 12, 6 pm at the Museum. Admission to the talk and to the Museum is free on Newport Gallery Night. The Newport Art Museum is located at 76 Bellevue Avenue, Newport, Rhode Island in the heart of Newport’s Old Quarter.

After the talk if the group is interested, we can head out somewhere in Newport for a bit of socializing before heading home.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf!
item.name: Scott Indermaur, Photographer: Artists Talk "This I believe: Revealed"
